/* kr.or.ddit.common.mapper.CommonMapper.addVisitrCo */ MERGE INTO HMPG_MANAGE HM USING DUAL ON (TO_CHAR(HM.HMPG_MANAGE_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HM.VISITR_CO = NVL(HM.VISITR_CO, 0) + 1
, HM.BRWSR_WHALE_CO = NVL(HM.BRWSR_WHALE_CO, 0) + 1
, HM.BRWSR_CHROME_CO = NVL(HM.BRWSR_CHROME_CO, 0) + 1
, HM.BRWSR_EDGE_CO = NVL(HM.BRWSR_EDGE_CO, 0) + 1
, HM.BRWSR_ETC_CO = NVL(HM.BRWSR_ETC_CO, 0) + 1
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( HMPG_MANAGE_DE , VISITR_CO
, BRWSR_WHALE_CO
, BRWSR_CHROME_CO
, BRWSR_EDGE_CO
, BRWSR_ETC_CO
) VALUES (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1, 1)

/* kr.or.ddit.common.mapper.CommonMapper.addLoginCo */ MERGE INTO HMPG_MANAGE HM USING DUAL ON (TO_CHAR(HM.HMPG_MANAGE_DE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') = TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) WHEN MATCHED THEN UPDATE SET HM.LOGIN_CO = NVL(HM.LOGIN_CO, 0) + 1 WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN INSERT ( HMPG_MANAGE_DE , LOGIN_CO ) VALUES (TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD'), 1)
